name: Quanticles
description:
CONTROLS:
TL;DR: Arrows / WASD + Shift (slow movement)
Move electrons closer and further apart with UP and DOWN arrows (or W and Skeys).
Change the spin direction with LEFT and RIGHT arrows (or A and D keys).
Use SHIFT to slow down the movement of the electrons for precise actions.

OBJECTIVE:
Gather as much energy as possible while avoiding the planets.

This game IS NOT scientifically accurate :)
Quantum physics has only been used as a reference for "joined together" (entangled) electrons.

This is my very first game in the Godot engine.
Even though the game itself isn't special, I've finished something while learning how to use the engine, which I take as a win.

All the assets, music, sound effects and code has been made from the ground up by me during the game jam.
